name: Stone Pickaxe
Location: Upon joining the game for the first time
description: A sturdy pickaxe made of stone for beginners. Reliable for basic mining tasks.

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: Sturdier than stone with improved durability. Mines resources at a moderate speed.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A professional-grade tool that balances speed and strength. The standard choice for serious miners.

name: Golden Pickaxe
description: Shiny and eye-catching, glimmers with every swing. Slightly fragile, but boosts your luck at finding rare ores.

name: Stonewake's Pickaxe
Location: Inner Cave, in the middle of the main inner cave
description: A heavy tool carved from boulders. Slow to swing, but strong enough to break nearly anything.

name: Platinum Pickaxe
description: A perfect tool to finish off your chores here, and demolish every rock you see nearby!

name: Arcane Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe charged with arcane energy, said to draw rare ores straight from the stone.

name: Cobalt Pickaxe
description: Carved from solid cobalt, its rocky blades hit hard and stay strong.

name: Titanium Pickaxe
description: Packed with sharp titanium edges and top spikes, build to tear through tough stone.

name: Uranium Pickaxe
description: A radioactive tool pulsing with unstable energy, striking rocks with explosive force.

name: Mythril Pickaxe
description: Forged from shimmering mythril, incredibly light yet powerful with every swing.

name: Lightite Pickaxe
description: Glowing with pure lightite energy, its radiant blades cut through stone effortlessly.

name: Magma Pickaxe
Location: Beside Amber, in Ashen Passage, next to the entrance of the Volcanic Depths
description: Created by forging volcanic rocks to mine volcanic rocks. Absolute cinema.

name: Demonic Pickaxe
Location: Demonic Pickaxe Altar, in Volcanic Depths
description: A pickaxe fused with demonic power, its crimson eye and glowing veins hunger for the strongest ores.
